about_the_game:
Something Lurks in the Woods... Something sinister... Something terrifying... It could really use a Hug.

Mayor May Knott is a “creepy-cozy,” single-player, 3D adventure game.

It’s about a shy girl who accidentally becomes the mayor of a haunted ghost town, and gradually rebuilds it into an idyllic community.

Along the way she overcomes her shyness and fears to make friends with a variety of strange characters and monsters!

30+ bizarre characters!

Meet Dick Tater – the tyrannical potato, Reel McKoi – the fishing fish, Madame Pastrami – the fortune telling sandwich, and Grandfather Clock – the clockwork retired rapper. And that's only in the first 5 minutes! Each of these characters has their own quirky personality, daily routine, and potential to become a resident of your growing town!

“Creepy-Cozy” Aesthetic

A ghost town filled with monsters who initially drive you away in TERROR! But as you become braver, you can stop running away and learn to deal with them; not with violence, but by offering them delicious home-cooked meals and free housing!

Dozens of Minigames and Puzzles!

Turning an abandoned ghost town into a beautiful utopia takes a lot of hard work, including junk fishing, bowl mining, exploring, gardening, repairing buildings with the hammer cam, recycling junk into materials, putting ghosts to rest, helping out residents, solving puzzles and mysteries, and recruiting help to move heavy obstacles and build new structures!

An Eclectic Mix of Original Songs

Learn new recipes by playing records on the “Edjukebox” in the Hall of Records! Each of these records plays an original, professionally-produced short song, in a wide variety of styles and genres!
